lib/mockData.js.content:
export const blogPosts = [ { id: 1, slug: 'effective-content-marketing-strategies', title: 'Effective Content Marketing Strategies for 2023', excerpt: 'Learn the top content marketing strategies that are driving results in 2023.', content: `

Content marketing continues to be one of the most effective ways to attract and engage potential customers. In this article, we'll explore the strategies that are working in 2023.

Focus on Quality Over Quantity

Rather than producing a high volume of content, focus on creating high-quality, valuable content that addresses your audience's needs and pain points.

Video Content is King

Video content continues to dominate social media and content marketing strategies. Short-form videos, in particular, are driving high engagement rates.

Personalization Matters

Personalizing your content to specific segments of your audience can significantly improve engagement and conversion rates.

`, category: 'Content Marketing', author: 'Jane Smith', date: '2023-10-15', readTime: '8 min read', featuredImage: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1504805572947-34fad45aed93?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2070&q=80', }, { id: 2, slug: 'seo-best-practices-guide', title: 'SEO Best Practices: A Comprehensive Guide', excerpt: 'Stay ahead of the competition with these proven SEO techniques and strategies.', content: `

Search engine optimization (SEO) is constantly evolving, and staying updated with the latest best practices is crucial for maintaining visibility in search results.

Technical SEO Fundamentals

Ensure your website has a solid technical foundation, including fast loading speeds, mobile-friendliness, and a secure HTTPS connection.

Content Optimization

Create high-quality, relevant content that addresses user intent and incorporates relevant keywords naturally.

Link Building Strategies

Build high-quality backlinks from authoritative websites in your industry to improve your domain authority and search rankings.

`, category: 'SEO', author: 'Michael Brown', date: '2023-09-28', readTime: '12 min read', featuredImage: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1486312338219-ce68d2c6f44d?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2072&q=80', }, { id: 3, slug: 'social-media-marketing-tips', title: '10 Social Media Marketing Tips for Growing Your Business', excerpt: 'Discover proven social media strategies to increase your brand visibility and engagement.', content: `

Social media marketing can be a powerful tool for growing your business and connecting with your audience. Here are 10 tips to help you succeed.

Know Your Audience

Understanding your target audience is crucial for creating content that resonates with them and drives engagement.

Consistency is Key

Maintain a consistent posting schedule to keep your audience engaged and improve your visibility on social platforms.

Leverage User-Generated Content

Encourage your customers to create and share content related to your brand to build social proof and expand your reach.

`, category: 'Social Media', author: 'Alex Johnson', date: '2023-09-10', readTime: '10 min read', featuredImage: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1611162617213-7d7a39e9b1d7?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2074&q=80', }, { id: 4, slug: 'email-marketing-automation', title: 'Email Marketing Automation: Boosting Conversions', excerpt: 'Learn how to implement effective email marketing automation to increase your conversion rates.', content: `

Email marketing automation can help you deliver personalized messages to your subscribers at the right time, increasing engagement and conversions.

Segment Your Email List

Divide your email list into segments based on demographics, behavior, or preferences to deliver more targeted and relevant content.

Create Automated Workflows

Set up automated email sequences triggered by specific actions or events, such as welcome emails, abandoned cart reminders, or post-purchase follow-ups.

Personalize Your Emails

Use dynamic content and personalization tokens to create emails that feel tailored to each recipient, increasing open and click-through rates.

`, category: 'Email Marketing', author: 'Sarah Davis', date: '2023-08-22', readTime: '9 min read', featuredImage: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1523726491678-bf852e717f6a?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2070&q=80', }, ]; export const caseStudies = [ { id: 1, slug: 'tech-startup-growth-strategy', title: 'How We Helped a Tech Startup Achieve 300% Growth in 6 Months', excerpt: 'Learn how our comprehensive growth strategy helped a tech startup triple their customer base in just 6 months.', content: `

This case study examines how we partnered with TechGen, a B2B SaaS startup, to implement a multi-faceted growth strategy that drove exceptional results.

The Challenge

TechGen had developed an innovative project management tool but was struggling to gain traction in a competitive market. They needed a comprehensive growth strategy to increase brand awareness, generate leads, and convert those leads into paying customers.

Our Approach

We developed a multi-channel marketing strategy that included:

  • Content marketing focused on addressing pain points of their target audience
  • SEO optimization to improve organic visibility
  • Targeted PPC campaigns to drive qualified traffic
  • Email nurture sequences to convert leads into customers
  • Strategic partnerships with complementary software providers

The Results

Within 6 months, TechGen experienced:

  • 300% increase in paying customers
  • 250% increase in organic traffic
  • 40% decrease in customer acquisition cost
  • 65% improvement in trial-to-paid conversion rate
`, industry: 'Technology', services: ['Content Marketing', 'SEO', 'PPC', 'Email Marketing'], results: ['300% customer growth', '250% traffic increase', '40% lower CAC'], featuredImage: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551434678-e076c223a692?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2070&q=80', }, { id: 2, slug: 'ecommerce-revenue-optimization', title: 'Ecommerce Revenue Optimization: $1.2M Additional Revenue in Q1', excerpt: 'Discover how we helped an ecommerce retailer optimize their customer journey to generate an additional $1.2M in revenue.', content: `

This case study details our partnership with FashionFusion, an online fashion retailer, to optimize their customer journey and significantly increase their revenue.

The Challenge

FashionFusion was experiencing high traffic to their website but struggling with cart abandonment and low conversion rates. They needed to optimize their customer journey to turn more visitors into buyers and increase average order value.

Our Approach

We implemented a comprehensive optimization strategy that included:

  • User experience analysis and website optimization
  • Personalized product recommendations based on browsing behavior
  • Abandoned cart recovery campaigns
  • Customer segmentation and targeted promotions
  • Loyalty program enhancements

The Results

In the first quarter after implementation, FashionFusion saw:

  • $1.2M additional revenue
  • 35% decrease in cart abandonment rate
  • 28% increase in average order value
  • 42% improvement in repeat purchase rate
`, industry: 'Ecommerce', services: ['Conversion Rate Optimization', 'Email Marketing', 'Analytics'], results: ['$1.2M additional revenue', '35% lower abandonment', '28% higher AOV'], featuredImage: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1542744173-8e7e53415bb0?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2070&q=80', }, { id: 3, slug: 'b2b-lead-generation-strategy', title: 'B2B Lead Generation: From 20 to 200 Qualified Leads Per Month', excerpt: 'Learn how we transformed a B2B company\'s lead generation strategy to 10x their qualified leads.', content: `

This case study examines our work with IndustrySolutions, a B2B industrial equipment provider, to revolutionize their lead generation approach.

The Challenge

IndustrySolutions was struggling with lead generation, averaging only 20 qualified leads per month despite significant spending on traditional marketing channels. They needed a modern, digital-first approach to attract and convert more qualified prospects.

Our Approach

We developed and implemented a comprehensive lead generation strategy including:

  • Industry-specific content marketing focused on solving customer pain points
  • LinkedIn targeting and advertising to reach decision-makers
  • Webinar series featuring industry experts and customer success stories
  • Marketing automation to nurture leads through the sales funnel
  • Sales and marketing alignment to improve lead qualification and handoff

The Results

Within 4 months, IndustrySolutions achieved:

  • 10x increase in qualified leads (from 20 to 200 per month)
  • 45% reduction in cost per qualified lead
  • 60% faster sales cycle
  • 35% increase in average deal size
`, industry: 'Manufacturing', services: ['Content Marketing', 'LinkedIn Marketing', 'Marketing Automation'], results: ['10x qualified leads', '45% lower cost per lead', '60% faster sales cycle'], featuredImage: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1552664730-d307ca884978?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2070&q=80', }, ]; export const pricingPlans = [ { id: 'basic', name: 'Basic', description: 'Perfect for small businesses just getting started with growth marketing.', price: '$1,997', frequency: 'per month', features: [ 'Content strategy development', 'SEO optimization', 'Monthly performance reports', 'Email marketing setup', '1 marketing channel management', '2 blog posts per month', 'Basic analytics dashboard', ], cta: 'Get Started', popular: false, }, { id: 'growth', name: 'Growth', description: 'Ideal for established businesses looking to accelerate their growth.', price: '$3,997', frequency: 'per month', features: [ 'Everything in Basic', 'Advanced content strategy', 'Conversion rate optimization', '3 marketing channels management', '4 blog posts per month', 'Weekly performance calls', 'A/B testing implementation', 'Lead nurturing campaigns', ], cta: 'Get Started', popular: true, }, { id: 'enterprise', name: 'Enterprise', description: 'Comprehensive solution for scaling companies with ambitious growth targets.', price: '$7,997', frequency: 'per month', features: [ 'Everything in Growth', 'Dedicated growth strategist', 'Custom reporting dashboard', 'Full-funnel optimization', 'Unlimited marketing channels', '8 blog posts per month', 'Marketing automation setup', 'Quarterly strategy reviews', 'Competitive analysis', ], cta: 'Contact Sales', popular: false, }, ]; export const resources = [ { id: 1, title: 'The Ultimate Guide to Content Marketing', description: 'A comprehensive guide to developing and implementing effective content marketing strategies.', category: 'Content Marketing', type: 'Guide', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1434030216411-0b793f4b4173?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2070&q=80', }, { id: 2, title: 'SEO Checklist for 2023', description: 'A step-by-step checklist to ensure your website is optimized for search engines in 2023.', category: 'SEO', type: 'Checklist', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1572021335469-31706a17aaef?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2070&q=80', }, { id: 3, title: 'Email Marketing Templates That Convert', description: 'A collection of proven email templates designed to increase open rates and conversions.', category: 'Email Marketing', type: 'Templates', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1596526131083-e8c633c948d2?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2069&q=80', }, { id: 4, title: 'Social Media Content Calendar', description: 'A 12-month content calendar template to plan and organize your social media strategy.', category: 'Social Media', type: 'Template', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1611162616475-46b635cb6868?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2074&q=80', }, { id: 5, title: 'B2B Lead Generation Playbook', description: 'Strategies and tactics to generate high-quality B2B leads consistently.', category: 'Lead Generation', type: 'Playbook', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1454165804606-c3d57bc86b40?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2070&q=80', }, { id: 6, title: 'Marketing ROI Calculator', description: 'A tool to measure and analyze the return on investment of your marketing campaigns.', category: 'Analytics', type: 'Tool', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1543286386-713bdd548da4?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=2070&q=80', }, ]; export const testimonials = [ { id: 1, name: 'Sarah Johnson', role: 'CEO, TechStart Inc.', quote: 'Working with GrowthOG transformed our marketing approach. We\'ve seen a 300% increase in qualified leads and our conversion rates have doubled. Their team is incredibly knowledgeable and responsive.', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1494790108377-be9c29b29330?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2&w=256&h=256&q=80', }, { id: 2, name: 'Michael Thompson', role: 'Marketing Director, E-commerce Solutions', quote: 'The strategic guidance from GrowthOG has been invaluable. They helped us identify our key growth levers and develop a scalable marketing system that continues to deliver results month after month.', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1500648767791-00dcc994a43e?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2&w=256&h=256&q=80', }, { id: 3, name: 'Jennifer Lee', role: 'Founder, BrandBoost', quote: 'I was impressed by GrowthOG\'s data-driven approach to marketing. They didn\'t just implement tactics; they developed a comprehensive strategy based on our business goals and market analysis.', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1580489944761-15a19d654956?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2&w=256&h=256&q=80', }, ]; export const faq = [ { question: 'How is GrowthOG different from other marketing agencies?', answer: 'Unlike traditional agencies, we focus exclusively on growth marketing with measurable ROI. Our team consists of specialists across various marketing disciplines who work together to implement comprehensive growth strategies tailored to your specific business goals.', }, { question: 'How long does it take to see results?', answer: 'Most clients begin to see measurable improvements within the first 30-60 days. However, significant growth typically becomes apparent after 3-6 months as our strategies gain momentum and we refine our approach based on data and performance.', }, { question: 'Do you work with businesses in any industry?', answer: 'We primarily work with B2B SaaS companies, ecommerce businesses, and professional service firms. Our specialized expertise in these areas allows us to deliver exceptional results for clients in these industries.', }, { question: "What's your pricing structure?", answer: "We offer tiered pricing plans starting at $1,997 per month. The specific investment depends on your business goals, the channels we'll be utilizing, and the scope of work. We're transparent about our pricing and will provide a detailed proposal after our initial strategy session.", }, { question: 'Do you require long-term contracts?', answer: 'Our standard agreement is a 6-month minimum engagement, which allows enough time to implement strategies and demonstrate meaningful results. After the initial term, we operate on a month-to-month basis with a 30-day notice period.', }, { question: 'Will I own all the marketing assets you create?', answer: 'Yes, you will have full ownership of all marketing assets, content, and creative materials we develop for your business. We believe in building assets that provide long-term value for our clients.', }, ]; export const teamMembers = [ { id: 1, name: 'Andrew Miller', role: 'Founder & CEO', bio: 'Andrew has over 15 years of experience in digital marketing and growth strategy. Before founding GrowthOG, he led growth at several successful SaaS startups and consulted for Fortune 500 companies.', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1560250097-0b93528c311a?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2&w=256&h=256&q=80', }, { id: 2, name: 'Elena Rodriguez', role: 'Head of Strategy', bio: 'Elena specializes in developing comprehensive growth strategies that align marketing efforts with business objectives. Her analytical approach helps clients identify their most effective growth levers.', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1573496359142-b8d87734a5a2?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2&w=256&h=256&q=80', }, { id: 3, name: 'Marcus Chen', role: 'SEO & Content Director', bio: 'Marcus leads our content and SEO initiatives, combining technical expertise with creative storytelling. He has helped numerous clients achieve first-page rankings for competitive keywords.', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2&w=256&h=256&q=80', }, { id: 4, name: 'Sophia Williams', role: 'Paid Media Specialist', bio: 'Sophia manages our clients\' paid advertising campaigns across multiple platforms. Her data-driven approach ensures optimal ROI and continuous performance improvement.', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1553514029-1318c9127859?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=facearea&facepad=2&w=256&h=256&q=80', }, ];

pages/pricing.js.content:
import Layout from '../components/layout/Layout'; import { useState } from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; export default function Pricing() { const [activeAccordion, setActiveAccordion] = useState(null); const toggleAccordion = (index) => { if (activeAccordion === index) { setActiveAccordion(null); } else { setActiveAccordion(index); } }; // FAQs for Link Building const linkBuildingFAQs = [ { question: "How long until I see results from link building?", answer: "This depends on many factors including your website's age, authority, competition, etc. Generally, initial results can be seen within 3-6 months, with more significant improvements over time." }, { question: "What types of links do you build?", answer: "We focus on high-quality, relevant, and editorial links from authoritative websites in your industry. Our approach emphasizes natural link acquisition through valuable content and relationships." }, { question: "How do you report on progress?", answer: "We provide comprehensive monthly reports that track rankings, traffic growth, new links built, and their impact. Our dashboard gives you a clear view of your campaign's performance." }, { question: "Do you require a minimum commitment?", answer: "Yes, we typically require a 3-month minimum commitment as link building is a long-term strategy that requires consistent effort to show meaningful results." }, { question: "Can you work with sites in any niche?", answer: "While we specialize in SaaS and B2B technology companies, we can work with businesses in most industries. Some highly regulated or restricted niches may require special consideration." }, { question: "Do I need to create content for the links?", answer: "No, our team handles all content creation needed for link building. We have expert writers who create high-quality content tailored to your industry and target sites." } ]; // FAQs about GrowthOG const aboutGrowthOGFAQs = [ { question: "What makes GrowthOG different from other link building agencies?", answer: "We focus exclusively on SaaS companies at different growth stages, with specialized strategies for each phase. Our team has deep experience in the SaaS industry, and we emphasize quality over quantity." }, { question: "How do you find link opportunities?", answer: "We use a proprietary process that combines competitor analysis, relationship building with publishers, and strategic content development to identify the most valuable link opportunities." }, { question: "How many links will I get each month?", answer: "This varies by package. Our Startup package typically includes 8-10 links monthly, Growth includes 25+, and Enterprise 40+. We focus on quality rather than arbitrary numbers." }, { question: "Do you offer any guarantees?", answer: "We guarantee the delivery of high-quality links as specified in your package. While we don't guarantee specific ranking positions (no ethical SEO company can), we have a proven track record of success." }, { question: "How quickly can you start my campaign?", answer: "Once you're onboarded, we can typically begin work within 2 weeks. The first month involves strategy development, with link acquisition starting in earnest from month 2." } ]; // Star rating component const StarRating = ({ rating }) => { return (
{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map((star) => ( ))}
); }; return (

import React, { useState } from 'react'; export default function LinkDomainsTable({ domains = [], hasCampaign = false }) { const [selectedDomains, setSelectedDomains] = useState([]); const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1); const toggleDomain = (domainId) => { if (selectedDomains.includes(domainId)) { setSelectedDomains(selectedDomains.filter(id => id !== domainId)); } else { setSelectedDomains([...selectedDomains, domainId]); } }; const toggleAll = () => { if (selectedDomains.length === domains.length) { setSelectedDomains([]); } else { setSelectedDomains(domains.map(domain => domain.id)); } }; return (
{!hasCampaign && (

Please create a campaign first in the Campaign Builder tab to add domains.

)}
0 && selectedDomains.length === domains.length} onChange={toggleAll} /> Domain DR Score Monthly Traffic Price Link Type

toggleDomain(5)} /> theverge.com 89 25.5M $850 Guest Post

import { useState } from 'react'; import DashboardLayout from '../../components/layout/DashboardLayout'; import Card from '../../components/ui/Card'; import Button from '../../components/ui/Button'; import { useAuth } from '../../context/AuthContext'; import { ChatBubbleBottomCenterTextIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; export default function DashboardFeedback() { const { user } = useAuth(); const [feedbackType, setFeedbackType] = useState('feature_request'); const [feedback, setFeedback] = useState(''); const [satisfaction, setSatisfaction] = useState(4); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const [isSubmitted, setIsSubmitted] = useState(false); // Handle form submission const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Set loading state setIsSubmitting(true); // In a real app, this would make an API call to save the feedback setTimeout(() => { setIsSubmitting(false); setIsSubmitted(true); // Reset form setFeedbackType('feature_request'); setFeedback(''); setSatisfaction(4); }, 1000); }; return (

Feedback

We appreciate your feedback and suggestions to help us improve our platform.

{isSubmitted ? (

Thank you for your feedback!

We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts with us. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us improve our platform.

) : (
Very Dissatisfied Very Satisfied
setSatisfaction(parseInt(e.target.value))} className="mt-2 w-full h-2 bg-secondary-200 rounded-lg appearance-none cursor-pointer" />
{[1, 2, 3, 4, 5].map((value) => ( {value} ))}

pages/dashboard/link-progress.js.content:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { ChevronLeftIcon, ChevronRightIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import DashboardMainLayout from '../../components/dashboard/DashboardMainLayout'; import DashboardHeader from '../../components/dashboard/DashboardHeader'; export default function LinkProgress() { const [timeFilter, setTimeFilter] = useState('All Time'); // Sample metrics data const metrics = { totalLinks: { value: 27, change: '+4 this month' }, liveLinks: { value: 19, rate: '70% success rate' }, pendingLinks: { value: 8, estimate: 'Expected in 7-14 days' }, avgDomainRating: { value: 58, change: '+2 points from last month' } }; case 'Revised': return 'bg-gray-500 text-white'; default: return 'bg-gray-500 text-white'; } }; return (

pages/api/webhooks/README.md.content:
# WordPress Webhook Integration

This folder contains API endpoints for WordPress integration, specifically for sitemap updates.

## Sitemap Update Webhook

When content is added, updated, or deleted in WordPress, the sitemap needs to be updated. This webhook endpoint provides an automated way to ensure your Next.js application's sitemap stays in sync with WordPress.

### Setup Instructions

1. **Install WP Webhooks Plugin**:
   - Log in to your WordPress admin dashboard
   - Go to Plugins > Add New
   - Search for "WP Webhooks"
   - Install and activate the plugin

2. **Configure the Webhook**:
   - In WordPress, go to WP Webhooks > Webhooks
   - Click "Add Webhook"
   - Set the following configuration:
     - Name: "Sitemap Update"
     - Webhook URL: `https://your-nextjs-app.com/api/webhooks/sitemap-update`
     - HTTP Method: POST
     - Content-Type: application/json

3. **Set Triggers**:
   Configure the webhook to trigger on these events:
   - Post published
   - Post updated
   - Post deleted
   - Page published
   - Page updated
   - Page deleted

4. **Optional: Add Authentication**:
   For better security, add a secret token:
   - In Next.js, set an environment variable: `WEBHOOK_SECRET=your-secret-token`
   - In WordPress webhook settings, add a custom header:
     - Name: `x-webhook-secret`
     - Value: `your-secret-token`
   - Uncomment the authentication code in the webhook handler

## How It Works

When WordPress triggers the webhook:

1. The endpoint clears the sitemap cache stored in memory
2. Next time a user visits your sitemap, fresh data is fetched from WordPress
3. The sitemap is automatically updated with any new content

## Testing

You can test the webhook by:

1. Creating a new post in WordPress
2. Checking your application's sitemap to verify the new content appears
3. Viewing the Next.js logs to see when the webhook is triggered

## Troubleshooting

If the webhook isn't working:

1. Check WordPress logs to ensure the webhook is being triggered
2. Check your application logs for any errors in the webhook handler
3. Verify the webhook URL is accessible from the WordPress server
4. Try manually clearing the cache by visiting: `/api/webhooks/sitemap-update`

replit.md.content:
# GrowthOG Website

## Overview

This is a B2B SaaS link building and SEO services website built with Next.js, focusing on serving SaaS companies at different growth stages. The platform combines content marketing through blog posts and case studies with lead generation and client dashboard functionality. It serves as both a marketing website and a client management portal for link building campaigns.

## User Preferences

Preferred communication style: Simple, everyday language.

## System Architecture

### Frontend Architecture
The application uses Next.js with a pages-based router for server-side rendering and static generation. The UI is built with React components using Tailwind CSS for styling, with a component-based architecture organized into layout, UI, and feature-specific components. The design system uses a custom color palette with primary (teal) and secondary (gray) colors, custom fonts (Inter and Lexend), and responsive design patterns.

### Content Management Strategy
The site implements a hybrid content approach combining WordPress headless CMS integration and mock data. WordPress content is fetched via REST API for blog posts and case studies, with caching mechanisms and sitemap generation. Local mock data serves as fallback and for development purposes.

### Authentication System
The authentication system uses a dual approach combining Supabase magic link authentication for full users and a temporary localStorage-based system for lead capture. The AuthContext manages user state across the application, handling both authenticated Supabase users and temporary sessions for leads who provide name/email without full authentication.

### Database Design
The system uses Drizzle ORM with PostgreSQL for database operations. The primary `users` table supports both Supabase-authenticated users (with supabaseId) and temporary lead users (without supabaseId), storing name, email, creation timestamps, and login tracking.

### Route Protection and Navigation
Protected routes like `/dashboard/` require authentication, with automatic redirects to `/auth/` for unauthenticated users. The navigation system supports multi-step modals, sidebar navigation, and tab-based interfaces. The dashboard includes multiple sections: Priority Content, Campaign Builder, Link Progress, Link Domains, and Settings.

## External Dependencies

### Authentication Services
- **Supabase**: Provides magic link authentication, user management, and session handling
- **@supabase/auth-helpers-nextjs**: Next.js-specific Supabase integration helpers
- **@supabase/auth-helpers-react**: React components and hooks for Supabase auth

### Email Services
- **SendGrid (@sendgrid/mail)**: Handles transactional emails including magic link delivery and notifications

### Content Management
- **WordPress REST API**: Headless WordPress integration for blog posts and case studies
- **Cheerio**: HTML parsing for content extraction and manipulation

### UI Framework
- **Tailwind CSS**: Utility-first CSS framework with custom configuration
- **@tailwindcss/typography**: Enhanced typography styling for content
- **@tailwindcss/forms**: Form styling components
- **@headlessui/react**: Unstyled, accessible UI components
- **@heroicons/react**: SVG icon library

### Database and ORM
- **Drizzle ORM**: Type-safe SQL query builder and ORM
- **PostgreSQL (pg)**: Primary database system
- **Drizzle-kit**: Database migration and schema management tools

### Session Management
- **Express**: Server framework for custom API routes
- **Express-session**: Session middleware for temporary user management
- **Passport**: Authentication middleware with local strategy support
- **connect-pg-simple**: PostgreSQL-based session store
